patthana23.24:1.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savitakkasavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pannarasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.
patthana23.24:2.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā savitakkasavicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana23.24:3.1: Nasavitakkasavicāraṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā satta, adhipatiyā satta …pe… avigate satta.
